      • setLogSegmentTruncated

        public LogSegmentMetadata setLogSegmentTruncated(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                                                 LogSegmentMetadata segment)
        Description copied from interface: MetadataUpdater
        Change the truncation status of a log segment to truncated. The operation won't be executed immediately. The update only happens after Transaction.execute().
        Specified by:
        setLogSegmentTruncated in interface MetadataUpdater
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction used to set the log segment status
        segment - segment to set truncation status to truncated
        Returns:
        log segment that truncation status is set to truncated.

        Specified by:

        new log segment

      • setLogSegmentPartiallyTruncated

        public LogSegmentMetadata setLogSegmentPartiallyTruncated(org.apache.distributedlog.util.Transaction<Object> txn,
                                                          LogSegmentMetadata segment,
                                                          DLSN minActiveDLSN)
        Description copied from interface: MetadataUpdater
        Change the truncation status of a log segment to partially truncated. The operation won't be executed until Transaction.execute().
        Specified by:
        setLogSegmentPartiallyTruncated in interface MetadataUpdater
        Parameters:
        txn - transaction used to set the log segment status
        segment - segment to set truncation status to partially truncated
        minActiveDLSN - DLSN within the log segment before which log has been truncated
        Returns:
        log segment that truncation status has been set to partially truncated
